FuncDef: The display ipv6 nd source-mac command displays information about ND attack entries with fixed source MAC addresses.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about ND attack entries with fixed source MAC addresses, run the display ipv6 nd source-mac command. The information includes the source MAC addresses, interfaces, aging times, and total number of ND attack entries.
